SELECT POST_INDEX, BOARD_NAME, POST_TITLE, USER_NAME AS POST_AUTHOR, POST_CREATED_DATE AS POST_DATE, POST_VIEWS AS POST_VIEW, POST_UPVOTES FROM POST_INFO_TB P, USER_INFO_TB U, BOARD_LIST_TB B WHERE P.POST_AUTHOR_INDEX = U.USER_INDEX AND P.BOARD_INDEX = B.BOARD_INDEX AND P.BOARD_INDEX = #{boardIndex}
AND P.POST_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
AND U.USER_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
AND (P.POST_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%') OR U.USER_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%'))
ORDER BY POST_CREATED_DATE DESC
ORDER BY POST_CREATED_DATE ASC
ORDER BY POST_UPVOTES DESC
ORDER BY POST_CREATED_DATE DESC
LIMIT #{startIndex}, #{endIndex};

SELECT BOARD_NAME AS BOARD_TITLE, POST_TITLE, USER_NAME AS POST_AUTHOR, POST_CREATED_DATE AS POST_DATE, POST_VIEWS AS POST_VIEW, POST_UPVOTES, POST_DOWNVOTES, POST_CONTENT FROM POST_INFO_TB P, USER_INFO_TB U, BOARD_LIST_TB B WHERE P.POST_AUTHOR_INDEX = U.USER_INDEX AND P.BOARD_INDEX = B.BOARD_INDEX AND P.POST_INDEX = #{postIndex};
